title: AI Marketing Mastermind
fullDescription: Dive deep into the world of AI-driven marketing with this comprehensive mastermind. Learn to build your own AI assistants, automate tedious tasks, create stunning visuals, and develop a future-proof marketing roadmap for 2025. This workshop is designed for marketers at all levels, from beginners to seasoned leaders, looking to leverage the power of AI.
benefits: Your Personal AI MARKETING ASSISTANT that works 24/7
The NO-CODE AUTOMATION BLUEPRINT that saves 15+ hours/week
The VISUAL MARKETING MASTERY System to create stunning images and videos
The AI TOOL BLACK BOOK (35+ cutting-edge tools)
The PERFECT PROMPT FORMULA for guaranteed results
The SET & FORGET Lead Generation System
targetAudience: 0-2 Yrs: Beginners – Leapfrog past veterans by mastering AI early
2-7 Yrs: Mid-Career – Combine your experience with AI skills to become irreplaceable
7-12 Yrs: Senior Marketers – Lead the AI revolution instead of being left behind
12+ Yrs: Marketing Leaders – Make confident AI decisions that keep your company ahead
learningObjectives: Understand and apply advanced AI marketing techniques and frameworks.
Master prompt engineering for effective AI-driven content creation.
Develop custom GPTs and AI marketing assistants tailored to specific brand needs.
Implement no-code automation solutions using tools like Make.com to streamline workflows.
Create high-quality, brand-consistent visual content using AI tools like Krea AI.
Formulate a strategic AI marketing roadmap for long-term success.

modules.title: Module 1: Advanced AI Marketing Techniques
modules.content: Covers the AI Marketing Framework, master prompting techniques, choosing AI models, GooseAI, AI app development tools like Bolt.new, and the MCP (Master Model, Context, Persona) strategic prompting framework.

modules.title: Module 2: VISUAL AI MASTERY
modules.content: Focuses on the AI Visual Marketing Blueprint, visual storytelling, brand consistency, Krea AI masterclass, creating professional images, perfect image prompt structure, and image-to-video conversion.

modules.title: Module 3: BUILDING YOUR AI MARKETING ASSISTANT
modules.content: Details custom GPT development, GPT architecture, training models with brand voice, advanced prompting, AI marketing deployment, and memory/context enhancement for GPTs.

modules.title: Module 4: AI Automations
modules.content: Explores social media automation with Make.com, including triggers, connecting multiple apps (Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn), integrating ChatGPT API for smart replies, and a hands-on activity to build an AI workflow.

description: Choosing the Right AI Models for Your Needs
Strategic Prompting Framework – MCP: Master Model, Context, and Persona Alignment
Krea AI Masterclass – Complete Feature Deep-Dive
Visual Content Ecosystem – Image-to-Video Conversion Techniques
Training Models With Your Brand Voice
AI Marketing Deployment – Integrating GPTs Into Workflows
Master Social Media Automation with Make.com
Trigger Actions – Automate Tasks Based on Events (New Followers, DMs, etc.)
Connect Multiple Apps – Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn & more
Integrate ChatGPT API – Auto-Generate Smart Replies, Captions & Content
HANDS-ON ACTIVITY – Build Your First AI Workflow (Real Social Media Automations)

mentors: K V S Dileep (Head of AI Initiatives)
guarantee: Join with the Early Bird Discount—massive value guaranteed!
certificateInfo: You will receive a certificate to validate your learnings and show practical, hands-on experience leveraging AI for real-world marketing challenges.

faqs.question: Is this workshop suitable for complete beginners in AI?
faqs.answer: Yes, while we cover advanced topics, the initial modules are designed to bring beginners up to speed. The hands-on activities will help solidify understanding.

faqs.question: What tools will I get hands-on experience with?
faqs.answer: You'll work with Make.com for automation, Krea AI for visuals, and learn to build Custom GPTs. We'll also discuss over 35 other cutting-edge AI tools.
